com.lithium.community.android.api

Class LiBaseGetClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lithium.community.android.api.LiBaseGetClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LiClient

    public class LiBaseGetClient
extends java.lang.Object
    All "get" clients are implemented in same way. They only vary in their TYPE and LIQL query. This class brings all the common codes together and provide a layer of abstraction to all of the "get" clients. Created by kunal.shrivastava on 10/19/16.
